page.title: 10EDUCATION (CONTINUED)
page.content: schools are too far away. Every year the Upper Juniors join with the Upper Juniors from Rosliston and Netherseal Primary Schools to go on a week's field studies' visit to such places as North Wales,Norfolk and Yorkshire. The schools also join up,together with Coton in the Elms Primary School,for the Area Sports. There is a football team and a netball team.This year,1985,the Walton netballers won the Philip Brown Memorial Shield at the annual Netball Tournament. At school,the pupils learn reading, writing and mathematics.They also do drama,craft,gardening,cooking and computer work. A school day lasts from 9.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m.
